quote: [Nicodemus] 'Magistra DeVega, can I ask for your help?'[DeVega] 'You can ask,' she said with her usual calmness, 'but the clerics haven't developed a cure for death by idiotic leadership.
quote_letters: NICODEMUS MAGISTRA DEVEGA CAN I ASK FOR YOUR HELPDEVEGA YOU CAN ASK SHE SAID WITH HER USUAL CALMNESS BUT THE CLERICS HAVENT DEVELOPED A CURE FOR DEATH BY IDIOTIC LEADERSHIP
